meanings.definition: To put to death as a legal penalty
meanings.sent1: The court ordered executing the criminal for his crimes.
meanings.sent2: The executioner was tasked with executing the prisoner.
meanings.sent3: The movie villain faced executing for his evil deeds.
meanings.sent4: The king's order of executing the traitor was carried out.
meanings.sent5: The condemned man knew his fate was executing.
